languages.text: {n}Вы протягиваете Теодоре руку — и воздух вокруг вас словно сжимается, становясь густым и вязким, окутывая вас и ваших спутников непроницаемой пеленой. Теодора улыбается вам — ее светящиеся ослепительно-голубые глаза внезапно напоминают вам о глазах Кунрада.{/n}

{n}You offer Theodora your hand — and the air around you seems to tighten, becoming thick and viscous, enveloping you and your companions in an impenetrable veil. Theodora smiles at you. Her radiant, piercing blue eyes suddenly remind you of Voigtvir's.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы протягиваете Теодоре руку — и воздух вокруг вас словно сжимается, становясь густым и вязким, окутывая вас и ваших спутников непроницаемой пеленой. Теодора улыбается вам — ее светящиеся ослепительно-голубые глаза внезапно напоминают вам о глазах Кунрада.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You offer Theodora your hand — and the air around you seems to tighten, becoming thick and viscous, enveloping you and your companions in an impenetrable veil. Theodora smiles at you. Her radiant, piercing blue eyes suddenly remind you of those of Voigtvir's.{/n}

{n}You offer Theodora your hand — and the air around you seems to tighten, becoming thick and viscous, enveloping you and your companions in an impenetrable veil. Theodora smiles at you. Her radiant, piercing blue eyes suddenly remind you of those of Voigtvir's.{/n}

{n}You offer Theodora your hand — and the air around you seems to tighten, becoming thick and viscous, enveloping you and your companions in an impenetrable veil. Theodora smiles at you. Her radiant, piercing blue eyes suddenly remind you of Voigtvir's.{/n}

{n}You offer Theodora your hand — and the air around you seems to tighten, becoming thick and viscous, enveloping you and your companions in an impenetrable veil. Theodora smiles at you. Her radiant, piercing blue eyes suddenly remind you of Voigtvir's.{/n}

{n}You offer Theodora your hand — and the air around you seems to tighten, becoming thick and viscous, enveloping you and your companions in an impenetrable veil. Theodora smiles at you. Her radiant, piercing blue eyes suddenly remind you of Voigtvir's.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你向西奥多拉伸出了手。你周围的空气似乎收紧了，变得厚重而粘稠，将你和你的同伴们笼罩在无法穿透的面纱之中。西奥多拉对你露出了微笑，她的蓝眼睛发出了刺眼的光芒，这不禁让你想起了维特威尔的目光。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You offer Theodora your hand — and the air around you seems to tighten, becoming thick and viscous, enveloping you and your companions in an impenetrable veil. Theodora smiles at you. Her radiant, piercing blue eyes suddenly remind you of Voigtvir's.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你向西奥多拉伸出了手。你周围的空气似乎收紧了，变得厚重而粘稠，将你和你的同伴们笼罩在无法穿透的面纱之中。西奥多拉对你露出了微笑，她的蓝眼睛发出了刺眼的光芒，这不禁让你想起了维特威尔的目光。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ofreces tu mano a Theodora y el aire a vuestro alrededor parece estrecharse, volviéndose denso y viscoso y cubriéndoos a tus compañeros y a ti de un velo impenetrable. Theodora te sonríe y, por un momento, sus brillantes ojos azules te recuerdan a los de Voigtvir.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You offer Theodora your hand — and the air around you seems to tighten, becoming thick and viscous, enveloping you and your companions in an impenetrable veil. Theodora smiles at you. Her radiant, piercing blue eyes suddenly remind you of Voigtvir's.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ofreces tu mano a Theodora y el aire a vuestro alrededor parece estrecharse, volviéndose denso y viscoso y cubriéndoos a tus compañeros y a ti de un velo impenetrable. Theodora te sonríe y, por un momento, sus brillantes ojos azules te recuerdan a los de Voigtvir.{/n}

languages.text: {n}シオドーラに手を差し出すと、あなたの周りの空気が引き締まり、厚く粘り気を帯び、あなたと従者たちを侵入不可能なベールで包み込む。シオドーラはあなたに微笑む。彼女の輝く、突き刺すような青い目は、突然ボイトヴィルを思い出させる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You offer Theodora your hand — and the air around you seems to tighten, becoming thick and viscous, enveloping you and your companions in an impenetrable veil. Theodora smiles at you. Her radiant, piercing blue eyes suddenly remind you of Voigtvir's.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたがテオドラに手を差し出すと、あなたの周りの空気が引き締まり、厚く粘り気を帯び、あなたとあなたの従者を侵入不可能なベールで包み込むように見える。テオドラはあなたに微笑む。彼女の輝く、突き刺すような青い目は、突然ボイドヴィルを思い出させる。{/n}
{n}シオドーラに手を差し出すと、あなたの周りの空気が引き締まり、厚く粘り気を帯び、あなたと従者たちを侵入不可能なベールで包み込む。シオドーラはあなたに微笑む。彼女の輝く、突き刺すような青い目は、突然ボイトヴィルを思い出させる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous tendez la main à Théodora. L'air autour de vous semble alors s'épaissir, comme s'il vous enveloppait, vous et vos compagnons, d'un voile impénétrable et visqueux. Théodora vous sourit. Ses yeux perçants d'un bleu vif vous rappellent soudainement ceux de Voigtvir.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You offer Theodora your hand — and the air around you seems to tighten, becoming thick and viscous, enveloping you and your companions in an impenetrable veil. Theodora smiles at you. Her radiant, piercing blue eyes suddenly remind you of Voigtvir's.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous tendez la main à Théodora. L'air autour de vous semble alors s'épaissir, comme s'il vous enveloppait, vous et vos compagnons, d'un voile impénétrable et visqueux. Théodora vous sourit. Ses yeux perçants d'un bleu vif vous rappellent soudainement ceux de Voigtvir.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du reichst Theodora die Hand – und die Luft um dich herum wird dichter, fast schon zähflüssig, sie umfasst dich und deine Gefährten mit einem undurchdringlichen Schleier. Theodora lächelt dich an. Ihre strahlenden, durchdringenden, blauen Augen erinnern dich plötzlich an die von Voigtvir.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You offer Theodora your hand — and the air around you seems to tighten, becoming thick and viscous, enveloping you and your companions in an impenetrable veil. Theodora smiles at you. Her radiant, piercing blue eyes suddenly remind you of Voigtvir's.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du reichst Theodora die Hand – und die Luft um dich herum wird dichter, fast schon zähflüssig, sie umfasst dich und deine Gefährten mit einem undurchdringlichen Schleier. Theodora lächelt dich an. Ihre strahlenden, durchdringenden, blauen Augen erinnern dich plötzlich an die von Voigtvir.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Elini Theodora'ya uzatıyorsun. Etrafındaki hava kalın ve yoğun bir hâl alarak sertleşiyor ve seni ve yoldaşlarını yırtılmaz bir örtü gibi sarıyor. Theodora sana gülümsüyor. Parlak, delici mavi gözleri; birdenbire sana Voigtvir'inkileri hatırlatıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You offer Theodora your hand — and the air around you seems to tighten, becoming thick and viscous, enveloping you and your companions in an impenetrable veil. Theodora smiles at you. Her radiant, piercing blue eyes suddenly remind you of Voigtvir's.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Elini Theodora'ya uzatıyorsun. Etrafındaki hava kalın ve yoğun bir hâl alarak sertleşiyor ve seni ve yoldaşlarını yırtılmaz bir örtü gibi sarıyor. Theodora sana gülümsüyor. Parlak, delici mavi gözleri birdenbire sana Voigtvir'inkileri hatırlatıyor.{/n}
